name: A Debt to be Paid in the Library of the Infinite
name_original: A Debt to be Paid in the Library of the Infinite
description:
A Debt to be Paid in the Library of the Infinite

A short game about forgiveness and library fines. My first bitsy game.

Move with arrow keys or wasd. Bump into things to interact :)

Created for the 📚 overdue library books 📚 (bitsy jam)

===================================================

CREDITS:

- Made in Adam Le Doux's Bitsy
- Used Andrew Yolland's Borksy to add in the transparent sprite hack
- Used Pixsy by ruin for map creation
- Music added using Add Music by Candle
- Music is "A Certain Lightness" by Blue Dot Sessions
